greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = [nr]-[kr]-[nr-kr], where r=sqrt(2), k=2, [ ]=floor.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) for(n=1,30, print1(floor(n*sqrt(2)) - floor(2*sqrt(2)) - floor((n-2)*sqrt(2)), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 31 2018
(MAGMA) [Floor(n*Sqrt(2)) - Floor(2*Sqrt(2)) - Floor((n-2)*Sqrt(2)): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 31 2018
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Mar 19 2011
